backend/main.mo: Backend actor managing user profiles, access control, and media submissions with audio/video support, including creation, listing, and retrieval logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old audio-only submissions to the new media format by mapping audio to media with default metadata.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to impacted frontend files, components, and test IDs for media upload and admin tooling updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short descriptions for all frontend source files summarizing their roles in routing, validation, admin tools, and media handling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base variables, theming, and global styles for both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application and providing the root container and favicon.
frontend/README.md: Documentation outlining frontend features, user flows, admin tools, security requirements, and current backend gaps for the AudioDrop app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, theme provider, layout shell, and admin-guarded pages using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAudio: Downloads an audio ExternalBlob as a WebM file with loading state and toast notifications.
Streams and plays audio via a direct URL with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMedia: Downloads audio or video ExternalBlobs using the correct MIME type with status feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminVideo: Streams and plays video via a direct URL with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/DeleteSubm: Shows a confirmation dialog and deletes a submission using a mutation, then navigates back with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/ExportTool: UI component providing CSV and ZIP export actions for submissions, using backend exports with a client-side CSV fallback.
Guards admin routes by checking authentication and admin status, redirecting or showing an access denied alert if needed.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Defines the main app layout with navigation, admin controls, and logout handling based on route and authentication state.
frontend/src/components/AudioRecorder.ts: Provides an in-browser audio recording interface with pause, resume, stop, and attach functionality, enforcing max duration.
frontend/src/components/LocalCaptchaChal: Implements a simple math-based CAPTCHA requiring correct input before proceeding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecorder.ts: Custom hook implementing audio recording with MediaRecorder, including pause/resume, timers, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and exposing login and logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for profiles, submissions, admin checks, and settings updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/adminSession.ts: Utility for managing a placeholder admin session token in sessionStorage with expiry checks.
frontend/src/lib/audioValidation.ts: Defines allowed audio formats, size and duration limits, and helper functions for validating audio files and formatting size/duration.
frontend/src/lib/csrf.ts: Implements sessionStorage-based placeholder CSRF token storage and header attachment utilities.
frontend/src/lib/downloads.ts: Provides helpers to trigger browser downloads from blobs or URLs with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/safeText.ts: Contains text sanitization, truncation, and HTML escaping utilities.
frontend/src/lib/submissionFormat.ts: Formats timestamps, file sizes, durations, and generates and displays submission IDs.
frontend/src/lib/videoValidation.ts: Defines allowed video formats and size limits, and validates video files with size, MIME, and extension checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin interface for searching, sorting, and viewing submissions with export tools.
Handles admin authentication via Internet Identity and optional profile setup before accessing the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Admin settings UI allowing toggling CAPTCHA and viewing upload limits, with save handling and loading states; backend support is required for actual persistence.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AuditLogPage.ts: Audit log viewer with filters for action type and date range, showing entries fetched from the backend once implemented.
frontend/src/pages/admin/SubmissionDetai: Shows detailed information for a specific submission, including metadata, media preview, download option, and delete controls.
frontend/src/pages/StudentUploadPage.tsx: UI and logic for students to upload audio or video submissions with validation, captcha, and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/SubmissionSuccessPage: Displays a confirmation message after a successful submission with navigation back home.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and enabling typography, container query, and animation plugins.
